Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, bu=
t I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimida=
ted. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, bu=
t i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the=
 Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

Gigas stayed planted to his sp=
ot, not moving an inch...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF=
4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
=
  Subject: Sorry soulstice


  Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the batt=
le. I found it.

  claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and G=
renade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air=
 and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas =
looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and t=
he fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas sw=
ings a huge punch at Razorclaw

  Razor Claws head snapped back from Gigas'=
 punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The im=
pact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but he stayed on h=
is feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I=
 hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to eliminate you in an u=
nfair fight".
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
    Subjec=
t: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


 =
   OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
      ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
  Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
      Subject: three on one har=
dly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


      Razor Claw saw the=
 three bots leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping a=
lliance members. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahe=
ad. He chased the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He tra=
nsformed to robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will sto=
p or you will be forced to, your choice."

      He aproached the three bot=
s ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
      =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: dachande 
        To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
        Subjec=
t: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


        ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
=
         
            They had heard the battling and decided to run away, =
they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus=
 as they were leaving, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. An=
d headed far away.





          eGroups Sponsor
